body.p: This clinical statement represents the case observation and contains the name of the reportable condition, the date of the onset of symptoms, the date of diagnosis, the name of the subject of the case report, along with diagnosing clinician and other clinical details of the case. All known symptom observations should be sent. In some workflows, it should be asserted if it is known the patient did NOT have a typical symptom. This template contains 4 of the 5 data elements determined by the CRSWg to be required when reporting a case to the public health department: reporter name, telephone, and address, and the name of condition. Note that various state and/or local health departments may require additional data elements. Reporters must adhere to local and state rules applicable to their location.
